title: Analyze Reader Journey on the Website
description: An analyst wants to understand the common paths readers take on the website. For example, what article do they often read after reading a story about the mayor?

tasks.description: Open the web analytics platform and find the 'Behavior Flow' or 'User Path' report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accesses the correct pathing analysis tool.

tasks.description: Filter the report to only show user journeys that started on a specific, popular article.
tasks.expected_outcome: The report is filtered to show the 'next page' data for a single article.

tasks.description: Identify the top 3 most common articles that readers navigate to next.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies common reader pathways, which can inform internal linking strategy.
